entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who works in the castle and has access to various rooms, including the staffroom. He is able to overhear conversations between professors.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as being present in the staffroom with Professor Moody, discussing a task.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is mentioned as being present in the staffroom with Professor McGonagall, discussing a task.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is Dobby's friend and the one he wants to protect from losing his Wheezy.

entities.name: wheezy
entities.description: Wheezy is an object that Harry Potter has, which Dobby is trying to protect him from losing.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that Harry Potter uses to move around unseen.

entities.name: gillyweed
entities.description: Gillyweed is an object that Harry Potter grabs and puts into his pocket.

entities.name: staffroom
entities.description: The staffroom is a location where professors like McGonagall and Moody are present, discussing tasks.

entities.name: kitchens
entities.description: Dobby is supposed to be in the kitchens, but he is currently with Harry Potter in the library.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is a location where Dobby works and has access to various rooms.

relationships.description: Dobby overheard Professor McGonagall talking about a task in the staffroom.
Dobby overheard Professor Moody talking about a task in the staffroom.
Harry Potter has possession of Wheezy, which Dobby is trying to protect him from losing.
Dobby is friends with Harry Potter and wants to protect him from losing his Wheezy.
Harry Potter uses the Invisibility Cloak, which Dobby is aware of.
Harry Potter grabs and puts Gillyweed into his pocket.
